comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Something horrible happened; it should be fixed now.

Might still be a bit of downtime for some images as Amazon CloudFront’s cache sorts itself out (not sure why they’re caching Cache-Control: no-cache responses, though, orz).

comments.body: Lawton should be back tomorrow to take a look, I have a few suspicions but no time to run them down ATM.
